result.eng: Do they know where we are?
result.ga: An bhfuil a fhios acu cá bhfuil muid
result.orig: An bhfuil a fhios acu cá bhfuil muid
result.html: An bhfuil a fhios acu cá bhfuil muidDo they know where we are?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil a ḟios acu cá ḃfuil muidDo they know where we are?

result.eng: Do you know Paul?
result.ga: An bhfuil aithne agat ar Phól
result.orig: An bhfuil aithne agat ar Phól
result.html: An bhfuil aithne agat ar PhólDo you know Paul?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil aiṫne agat ar ṖólDo you know Paul?

result.eng: Do you know Prague well?
result.ga: An bhfuil eolas maith agat ar Phrág
result.orig: An bhfuil eolas maith agat ar Phrág
result.html: An bhfuil eolas maith agat ar PhrágDo you know Prague well?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil eolas maiṫ agat ar ṖrágDo you know Prague well?

result.eng: Do you know the way?
result.ga: An bhfuil fios an bhealaigh agat
result.orig: An bhfuil fios an bhealaigh agat
result.html: An bhfuil fios an bhealaigh agatDo you know the way?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil fios an ḃealaiġ agatDo you know the way?

result.eng: I didn't know whether I should stay or go.
result.ga: Bhí mé idir dhá chomhairle ar chóir dom fanacht nó imeacht
result.orig: Bhí mé idir dhá chomhairle ar chóir dom fanacht nó imeacht
result.html: Bhí mé idir dhá chomhairle ar chóir dom fanacht nó imeachtI didn't know whether I should stay or go.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé idir ḋá ċoṁairle ar ċóir dom fanaċt nó imeaċtI didn't know whether I should stay or go.

result.eng: As far as I know, this is true.
result.ga: A fhad agus is eol dom tá sé seo fíor
result.orig: A fhad agus is eol dom tá sé seo fíor
result.html: A fhad agus is eol dom tá sé seo fíorAs far as I know, this is true.
result.ponchtml: A ḟad agus is eol dom tá sé seo fíorAs far as I know, this is true.

result.eng: Get to know the Donegal Gaeltacht.
result.ga: Cuir aithne ar Ghaeltacht Dhún na nGall
result.orig: Cuir aithne ar Ghaeltacht Dhún na nGall
result.html: Cuir aithne ar Ghaeltacht Dhún na nGallGet to know the Donegal Gaeltacht.
result.ponchtml: Cuir aiṫne ar Ġaeltaċt Ḋún na nGallGet to know the Donegal Gaeltacht.

result.eng: Why do you not know?
result.ga: Cén fáth nach bhfuil a fhios agat
result.orig: Cén fáth nach bhfuil a fhios agat
result.html: Cén fáth nach bhfuil a fhios agatWhy do you not know?
result.ponchtml: Cén fáṫ naċ ḃfuil a ḟios agatWhy do you not know?

result.eng: A man I know.
result.ga: Fear atá ar m'aithne
result.orig: Fear atá ar m'aithne
result.html: Fear atá ar m'aithneA man I know.
result.ponchtml: Fear atá ar m'aiṫneA man I know.

result.eng: As you know, the deadline is tomorrow.
result.ga: Mar is eol duit amárach an spriocdháta
result.orig: Mar is eol duit amárach an spriocdháta
result.html: Mar is eol duit amárach an spriocdhátaAs you know, the deadline is tomorrow.
result.ponchtml: Mar is eol duit amáraċ an spriocḋátaAs you know, the deadline is tomorrow.

result.eng: I don't know what time it is.
result.ga: Níl a fhios agam cén t-am é
result.orig: Níl a fhios agam cén t-am é
result.html: Níl a fhios agam cén t-am éI don't know what time it is.
result.ponchtml: Níl a ḟios agam cén t-am éI don't know what time it is.

result.eng: I only know him through the Internet.
result.ga: Níl agam air ach ríomhaithne
result.orig: Níl agam air ach ríomhaithne
result.html: Níl agam air ach ríomhaithneI only know him through the Internet.
result.ponchtml: Níl agam air aċ ríoṁaiṫneI only know him through the Internet.

result.eng: They don't understand their own business. They don't know what they are doing.
result.ga: Níl fios a ngnó acu
result.orig: Níl fios a ngnó acu
result.html: Níl fios a ngnó acuThey don't understand their own business. They don't know what they are doing.
result.ponchtml: Níl fios a ngnó acuThey don't understand their own business. They don't know what they are doing.

result.eng: You may know this already.
result.ga: Seans go bhfuil sé seo ar eolas agaibh cheana
result.orig: Seans go bhfuil sé seo ar eolas agaibh cheana
result.html: Seans go bhfuil sé seo ar eolas agaibh cheanaYou may know this already.
result.ponchtml: Seans go ḃfuil sé seo ar eolas agaiḃ ċeanaYou may know this already.

result.eng: I know what is needed.
result.ga: Tá a fhios agam cad atá de dhíth
result.orig: Tá a fhios agam cad atá de dhíth
result.html: Tá a fhios agam cad atá de dhíthI know what is needed.
result.ponchtml: Tá a ḟios agam cad atá de ḋíṫI know what is needed.

result.eng: I know that she is married.
result.ga: Tá a fhios agam go bhfuil sí pósta
result.orig: Tá a fhios agam go bhfuil sí pósta
result.html: Tá a fhios agam go bhfuil sí póstaI know that she is married.
result.ponchtml: Tá a ḟios agam go ḃfuil sí póstaI know that she is married.

result.eng: I know that area.
result.ga: Tá eolas agam ar an cheantar sin
result.orig: Tá eolas agam ar an cheantar sin
result.html: Tá eolas agam ar an cheantar sinI know that area.
result.ponchtml: Tá eolas agam ar an ċeantar sinI know that area.

result.eng: I know the way, lit. I have knowledge of the way.
result.ga: Tá fios an bhealaigh agam
result.orig: Tá fios an bhealaigh agam
result.html: Tá fios an bhealaigh agamI know the way, lit. I have knowledge of the way.
result.ponchtml: Tá fios an ḃealaiġ agamI know the way, lit. I have knowledge of the way.

result.eng: She's married, as far as I know.
result.ga: Tá sí pósta go bhfios dom
result.orig: Tá sí pósta go bhfios dom
result.html: Tá sí pósta go bhfios domShe's married, as far as I know.
result.ponchtml: Tá sí pósta go ḃfios domShe's married, as far as I know.

result.eng: I don't know where he is. I wonder where he is.
result.ga: Ní fheadar cá bhfuil sé
result.orig: Ní fheadar cá bhfuil sé
result.html: Ní fheadar cá bhfuil séI don't know where he is. I wonder where he is.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḟeadar cá ḃfuil séI don't know where he is. I wonder where he is.

result.eng: I know.
result.ga: Tá a fhios agam
result.orig: Tá a fhios agam
result.html: Tá a fhios agamI know.
result.ponchtml: Tá a ḟios agamI know.

result.eng: I don't know.
result.ga: Níl a fhios agam
result.orig: Níl a fhios agam
result.html: Níl a fhios agamI don't know.
result.ponchtml: Níl a ḟios agamI don't know.

result.eng: We know that.
result.ga: Tá a fhios againn é sin
result.orig: Tá a fhios againn é sin
result.html: Tá a fhios againn é sinWe know that.
result.ponchtml: Tá a ḟios againn é sinWe know that.

result.eng: Do you know my wife?
result.ga: An bhfuil aithne agat ar mo bhean
result.orig: An bhfuil aithne agat ar mo bhean
result.html: An bhfuil aithne agat ar mo bheanDo you know my wife?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil aiṫne agat ar mo ḃeanDo you know my wife?

result.eng: Do you know my brother?
result.ga: An bhfuil aithne agat ar mo dheartháir
result.orig: An bhfuil aithne agat ar mo dheartháir
result.html: An bhfuil aithne agat ar mo dheartháirDo you know my brother?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil aiṫne agat ar mo ḋearṫáirDo you know my brother?

result.eng: Do you know my sister?
result.ga: An bhfuil aithne agaibh ar mo dheirfiúr
result.orig: An bhfuil aithne agaibh ar mo dheirfiúr
result.html: An bhfuil aithne agaibh ar mo dheirfiúrDo you know my sister?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil aiṫne agaiḃ ar mo ḋeirfiúrDo you know my sister?

result.eng: I know that it is at two o'clock that my interview is to take place.
result.ga: Tá a fhios agam gur ag a dó a chlog atá m'agallamh ar siúl
result.orig: Tá a fhios agam gur ag a dó a chlog atá m'agallamh ar siúl
result.html: Tá a fhios agam gur ag a dó a chlog atá m'agallamh ar siúlI know that it is at two o'clock that my interview is to take place.
result.ponchtml: Tá a ḟios agam gur ag a dó a ċlog atá m'agallaṁ ar siúlI know that it is at two o'clock that my interview is to take place.

result.eng: You know everybody, then?
result.ga: Tá aithne agat ar gach éinne mar sin
result.orig: Tá aithne agat ar gach éinne mar sin
result.html: Tá aithne agat ar gach éinne mar sinYou know everybody, then?
result.ponchtml: Tá aiṫne agat ar gaċ éinne mar sinYou know everybody, then?

result.eng: I don't know.
result.ga: Níl a fhios agam
result.orig: Níl a fhios agam
result.html: Níl a fhios agamI don't know.
result.ponchtml: Níl a ḟios agamI don't know.

result.eng: I know well that you are proud of her, and not without reason.
result.ga: Tá a fhios agam go maith go bhfuil tú bródúil aisti agus údar agat
result.orig: Tá a fhios agam go maith go bhfuil tú bródúil aisti agus údar agat
result.html: Tá a fhios agam go maith go bhfuil tú bródúil aisti agus údar agatI know well that you are proud of her, and not without reason.
result.ponchtml: Tá a ḟios agam go maiṫ go ḃfuil tú bródúil aisti agus údar agatI know well that you are proud of her, and not without reason.

result.eng: I will know then whether there is any cause for my jealousy.
result.ga: Beidh a fhios agam ansin an bhfuil údar le m'éad
result.orig: Beidh a fhios agam ansin an bhfuil údar le m'éad
result.html: Beidh a fhios agam ansin an bhfuil údar le m'éadI will know then whether there is any cause for my jealousy.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ a ḟios agam ansin an ḃfuil údar le m'éadI will know then whether there is any cause for my jealousy.

result.eng: I have no reason to believe they didn't know each other.
result.ga: Níl aon údar agamsa lena cheapadh nach raibh aithne acu ar a chéile
result.orig: Níl aon údar agamsa lena cheapadh nach raibh aithne acu ar a chéile
result.html: Níl aon údar agamsa lena cheapadh nach raibh aithne acu ar a chéileI have no reason to believe they didn't know each other.
result.ponchtml: Níl aon údar agamsa lena ċeapaḋ naċ raiḃ aiṫne acu ar a ċéileI have no reason to believe they didn't know each other.

result.eng: As we know now, the Nazis didn't stop with Poland.
result.ga: Mar is eol dúinn anois níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn
result.orig: Mar is eol dúinn anois níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn
result.html: Mar is eol dúinn anois níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainnAs we know now, the Nazis didn't stop with Poland.
result.ponchtml: Mar is eol dúinn anois níor stop na Naitsiṫe leis an bPolainnAs we know now, the Nazis didn't stop with Poland.

result.eng: And you should know that they look with favour on what priests say in Dublin.
result.ga: Agus bíodh a fhios agat go mbíonn toradh i mBaile Átha Cliath fá choinne na sagart
result.orig: Agus bíodh a fhios agat go mbíonn toradh i mBaile Átha Cliath fá choinne na sagart
result.html: Agus bíodh a fhios agat go mbíonn toradh i mBaile Átha Cliath fá choinne na sagartAnd you should know that they look with favour on what priests say in Dublin.
result.ponchtml: Agus bíoḋ a ḟios agat go mbíonn toraḋ i mBaile Áṫa Cliaṫ fá ċoinne na sagartAnd you should know that they look with favour on what priests say in Dublin.

result.eng: I don't know what I'd do without you.
result.ga: Níl a fhios agam goidé a dhéanfainn ach go bé thú
result.orig: Níl a fhios agam goidé a dhéanfainn ach go bé thú
result.html: Níl a fhios agam goidé a dhéanfainn ach go bé thúI don't know what I'd do without you.
result.ponchtml: Níl a ḟios agam goidé a ḋéanfainn aċ go bé ṫúI don't know what I'd do without you.

result.eng: They haven't had anything to eat since I don't know when.
result.ga: Ní bhfuair siad aon ghreim le níl a fhios agam cá huair
result.orig: Ní bhfuair siad aon ghreim le níl a fhios agam cá huair
result.html: Ní bhfuair siad aon ghreim le níl a fhios agam cá huairThey haven't had anything to eat since I don't know when.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃfuair siad aon ġreim le níl a ḟios agam cá huairThey haven't had anything to eat since I don't know when.

result.eng: You should know that going abroad is no picnic.
result.ga: Bíodh a fhios agat nach só ar bith atá i ndán duit ar an choigrích
result.orig: Bíodh a fhios agat nach só ar bith atá i ndán duit ar an choigrích
result.html: Bíodh a fhios agat nach só ar bith atá i ndán duit ar an choigríchYou should know that going abroad is no picnic.
result.ponchtml: Bíoḋ a ḟios agat naċ só ar biṫ atá i ndán duit ar an ċoigríċYou should know that going abroad is no picnic.

result.eng: You will know you shouldn't grab a hen by its wing.
result.ga: Beidh a fhios agat gan greim eiteoga a fháil ar chirc
result.orig: Beidh a fhios agat gan greim eiteoga a fháil ar chirc
result.html: Beidh a fhios agat gan greim eiteoga a fháil ar chircYou will know you shouldn't grab a hen by its wing.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ a ḟios agat gan greim eiteoga a ḟáil ar ċircYou will know you shouldn't grab a hen by its wing.

result.eng: You know what my advice to you is?
result.ga: 'Bhfuil a fhios agat goidé mo chomhairlese duit
result.orig: 'Bhfuil a fhios agat goidé mo chomhairlese duit
result.html: 'Bhfuil a fhios agat goidé mo chomhairlese duitYou know what my advice to you is?
result.ponchtml: 'Ḃfuil a ḟios agat goidé mo ċoṁairlese duitYou know what my advice to you is?
